author: Curtis Ide
releaseNotes:
Oelo Lights Zone Driver v0.9.0

Control Oelo Lights outdoor lighting controllers from Hubitat. Capture patterns created in the Oelo Evolution app and reuse them in automations and scenes.

Key Features:
- Capture and store up to 200 patterns per zone
- Support for spotlight plans and standard pattern types
- Customize spotlight plan LED selection
- Pattern validation ensures reliability
- Auto-polling with configurable intervals
- Pattern management: rename and delete patterns
- Multi-zone support (up to 6 zones)
- Simple HTTP API - no authentication required
